data.name: MatchFighter
data.description:
Welcome to Discord: https://discord.gg/kW3CqRYNTY to share your wonderful game moments or creative ideas with us, we will organize activities regularly and feedback on players' suggestions carefully!

The best casual Match-Three game during your spare time, start your camping in the forest!

The Match Fighter forest lies a rich variety of treasures, if you look carefully at the treasure lot hiding in the bush, you will soon find two identical ones! While playing, you can explore the forest and get in touch with nature, throw a basketball or you can return to the tent for a short nap, and enjoy your camping time!

Key Features:
- Create your Avatar to enter our camping themed forest, explore the surroundings while playing
- A warm and exquisite tent just for you, touch the items inside and you may find something unexpected
- A variety of matching models: cute animals, sweet food, cool toys & beautiful accessories
- Multiplayer will launch soon to increase the fun of playing together
